nascita-e-studi: Emanuela Degan borns in Venice in 1966. She attends the one school she has dreamed of since childhood: the Liceo Artistico in Venice. She then passionately followed the painting section of the Academy of Fine Arts under the guidance of professors Carmelo Zotti and Ennio Finzi.
vita-lontano-da-arte: In the meantime she began to exhibit in group shows and had a solo exhibition in Padova. In 1991 she drastically slows down her artistic activity, as sometimes happens for work reasons that force her to move to Florence.
ripresa-attivita: In 2017 after following family and work for 17 years, in her free time she resumes working on his Art. She joins many art associations throughout Tuscany and with them collaborates on various projects, becomes an adjunct councilor for 4 years of Giotto's House Museum in Vicchio (Florence), where in 2019 she she organizes an exhibition of 65 women artists for Women's Day dedicated to Artemisia Gentileschi and exhibits throughout Tuscany getting to know different realities.
stile-artistico-e-presente: Her personal artistic approach knows no contaminations from this experience but only an opportunity for growth, remaining faithful to her figurative nature related to the human body. She momentarily abandons the use of the palette and brushes because she does not feel them suited to her own need to approach to her thinking, her own timing and the depth of detail that the pencil allows her to achieve. Indeed, it is the pencil that allows her to “scratch the surface,” a strong need she feels within herself. The ancient technique of hatching so debased belongs to her, it allows no mistakes, it is clean and expressive. Still because of her personal life experiences she chooses to represent the female world, women! Women who dream, intense women who express in an almost theatrical way strong feelings and also a lot of sweetness, pain, starvation. Great is the desire for light and deep darks, refined highlights, areas of strong shadows that enhance them. Graphic pictures full of symbols, deep, intense looks that portray the soul, the scibile feminine. Strongly inspired by the artistic current Pre-Raphaelite, Symbolist and Art Nouveau. Returning to the female, she believes that she is to be protected and exalted, these women full of thoughts, feelings, love and fear must be represented so that no one forgets them in a world where there is no need to say anything about the female condition. Women who challenge, they observe, who need love. Right now she is collaborating actively with a theater company “Live Art.” She teaches drawing from life with moderate success given the result of the students. She has been collaborating since 2000 with various theater companies and theaters as a set designer. Present on YouTube in many video interviews published in the most important art magazine in Tuscany “la Toscana nuova”, present in bookstores with many editorial and catalog. Author of a Cover of the book “Saga of the writer fantasy - Lorenzo Baggiani” always on sale online and in bookstores.
